title: I have lost access to my associated email however I still have access to my account
content: I deleted my Gmail account recently and forgot that my Firefox account had it as the primary email, so I cannot change it as it requires sending an email to my old Gmail. I would like to change my primary email (The old one) to my secondary email, thank you for your time.
creator: nicfay68

title: Scam pop ups
content: I cannot use Firefox bc I get pop ups for scamming me.
creator: canadaandchile

title: Recuperar Carpeta Marcador borrado accidentalmente
content:
Buenas Comunidad!

Sin querer borre una carpeta de marcadores valiosa que tenía ¿hay posibilidad de recuperarla de alguna manera?
